Description:
You have reached a crossroads, to the north the path leads to an old watchtower, to the south the path leads you to the bridges that cross the river.

On the south path you can see two werewolves patrolling, looking at their clothes you can see that they are bandits and they are up to no good.

If you want to go south, you will have to deal with them.
DescriptionAction: How would you like to proceed?
